gui

Class WaitingListConfimationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.WaitingListConfimationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class WaitingListConfimationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for handling the waiting list confirmation view. It allows users to see the confirmation details of their reservation placed in the waiting list.

    • Method Detail

      • CreateConfirmationWaitingList

        public void CreateConfirmationWaitingList(Reservation reservation)
        Fills in the reservation details into the confirmation form. This method is called upon initialization to display the reservation details.
        Parameters:
        reservation - The reservation object containing the details to be displayed.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded. It populates the form with the reservation details.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        arg0 - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if not known.
        arg1 - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts the waiting list confirmation view. This method sets up and displays the scene for the waiting list confirmation.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - The primary stage for this application.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs during loading the FXML.
